channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Street light out, 22nd July
item.description:
This is the street light outside the Sanjugo restaurant, at the end of Hugh Street on the crossroads with Cambridge St. It has been out for a few days and this is a dark cul-de-sac which needs light.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44, Hugh Street, Victoria, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Wooden pallete and metal dumped in Celandine Drive SE28 8EP, 21st July
item.description:
A broken wooden pallet and large metal pieces dumped behind the street sign on the entrance to Celandine Drive SE28 8EP. Junction Epstein Rd SE28. Also 3 wooden fence posts and some black sacks dumped on pavement near number 39 Celandine Drive SE28 8EP Both fly tips have been there about 6 weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Celandine Drive, Thamesmead, London

item.title: Loads of black sacks on pavement, 21st July
item.description:
In Nuxley Road, in the village, there are a pile of black sacks dumped on the pavement, where the road narrows (outside no. 49), opposite the funeral directors.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 53, Nuxley Road, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Huge rats roaming around, 21st July
item.description:
Extremely large rats roaming around the grass area. Council not taking action against pest problem which has been an issue for years. Cannot walk across the common anymore without huge rats scavenging across in broad daylight.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): High Road, West Green, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Llanover Road, Shooters Hill, London

item.title: Noise, and fire hazard from business, 21st July
item.description:
There is some kind of scrapyard here. People are working on cars up to 11 or nearly midnight pretty much every day.There is rubbish piled up here and behind the church hall which is a massive fire hazard. Is it even a legal business?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Lamb Lane, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is a water trail mixed with grease coming from a drive into the pavement. Someone could slip., 21st July
item.description:
This water trail comes from a drive of a house onto the pavement and cause some one to slip.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lincoln Road, Southbury, London

item.category: Standing water on the road or footway

item.title: Someone Peeing and spitting in the lift. For more than a year now., 21st July
item.description:
A camera in the lift would identify this disgusting person. I don't know what kind of person would do that. Families live here with kids. Lets see if this council cares at all about this community and step up. Super high service charge and no reply here.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Thurtle Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Jason Walk, Coldharbour, London

item.title: Floodlight in backyard is on 24/7 for nearly a year, 21st July
item.description:
Property seems to be an Airbnb/short stay. Have tried contacting via Airbnb but no reply from landlord. The light is extremely bright and shines into all rooms facing the back of the house like daylight. Hard to block it out. 24/7 day and night it is on.

Report on FixMyStreet
